languages.text: {n}Чорда высокомерно морщится.{/n} "Я не имею пристрастия к дурману любого сорта. А воспоминание о том, как ты вмешал{mf|ся|ась} в мои планы, не смоет ничто — обещаю".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, но сразу после приема я вернусь на свое судно. Меня ждет исповедь в корабельной часовне".

languages.text: {n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."
languages.original_text: {n}Чорда высокомерно морщится.{/n} "Я не имею пристрастия к дурману любого сорта. А воспоминание о том, как ты вмешал{mf|ся|ась} в мои планы, не смоет ничто — обещаю".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, but, once the reception is concluded, I will be returning to my ship immediately. I must go to confession at the ship's chapel."
{n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."
{n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."
{n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."
{n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."

languages.text: {n}コーダは他人を見下すようなしかめっ面をしている。{/n}「酔うものはいかなるものも口にしたくはない。それに、どんなものでもこの記憶は洗い流せない―絶対にだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}コーダは他人を見下すようなしかめっ面をしている。{/n}「酔うものはいかなるものも口にしたくはない。それに、どんなものでもこの記憶は洗い流せない―絶対にだ」

languages.text: {n}库尔达脸色一变，但仍旧咄咄逼人。{/n}“我不赞成使用任何类型的麻醉剂。而且，我可以向你保证，我绝不会忘记你是如何破坏我的计划的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}库尔达脸色一变，但仍旧咄咄逼人。{/n}“我不赞成使用任何类型的麻醉剂。而且，我可以向你保证，我绝不会忘记你是如何破坏我的计划的。”

languages.text: {n}Chorda hace una mueca altiva.{/n} «No soy dada a los estupefacientes de ninguna clase, y no hay nada que borre el recuerdo de su interferencia en mis planes. Eso se lo prometo».
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chorda hace una mueca altiva.{/n} «No soy dada a los estupefacientes de ninguna clase, y no hay nada que borre el recuerdo de su interferencia en mis planes. Eso se lo prometo».

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Chorda se tord dans une grimace hautaine.{/n} « Je n'apprécie guère les stupéfiants. Et rien ne me fera oublier que vous avez interféré dans mes plans, je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Chorda se tord dans une grimace hautaine.{/n} « Je n'apprécie guère les stupéfiants. Et rien ne me fera oublier que vous avez interféré dans mes plans, je vous le promets. »

languages.text: {n}Chordas Gesicht verzieht sich zu einer hochmütigen Grimasse.{/n} "Ich neige nicht zu Rauschmitteln jedweder Art. Und nichts wird die Erinnerung an Eure Einmischung in meine Pläne tilgen – das versichere ich Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chordas Gesicht verzieht sich zu einer hochmütigen Grimasse.{/n} "Ich neige nicht zu Rauschmitteln jedweder Art. Und nichts wird die Erinnerung an Eure Einmischung in meine Pläne tilgen – das versichere ich Euch."

languages.text: {n}Chorda'nın yüzü, mağrur bir ifadeyle buruşuyor.{/n} "Sarhoş edici herhangi bir maddeye meylim yok. Ayrıca sözüm olsun, hiçbir şey planlarıma burnunu sokuşunun anısını silemeyecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda's face twists in a haughty grimace.{/n} "I am not inclined to intoxicants of any sort. And nothing will wash away the memory of how you interfered in my plans — I promise you that."
